# vector
+ vector

 2. complex
 3. logical
 4. list
```{r}

(vec3 <- c(1, 4, 7, 12))
```
+ seq

 2. to
 3. by
 4. length.with length.out
+ rep

 2. times
 3. length.out
```{r}
(vec2 <- seq(from = 3, to = 12, by = 2))
length(vec2)
nchar("my first vector!")
```

+ property
 1. names
 2. which
  - max
  - min

```{r}
which(vec2 > 5)
vec2[which(vec2 > 5)]
which.max(vec2)
```
